title: Abiding Heart
description: Tinder and Jason are back in Honolulu, determined to face the future...but an unexpected friend from Tinder’s Hotel Street days turns their lives upside down.Now that Jason is home, safe from his horrific mission aboard the SS Malama, he and Tinder once again return to Honolulu to help in the rebuilding of Pearl Harbor. Jason, who faces a military tribunal on the fate of the cargo ship’s lost crew members, suffers from traumatic nightmares as a result of his ordeal. Tinder, determined to nurture and protect his lover, is devastated when the truth of the crew’s capture and Jason’s dramatic escape is revealed.Determined to face the future with renewed determination and courage, the two men also soon learn that fate has some other new surprises in store for them. In the ensuing months of WWII Honolulu, Jason and Tinder grow closer and closer in spite of hate—and help—from unexpected quarters, their abiding hearts rediscover the meaning of aloha.Reader Advisory: This book is best read in sequence as part of a series and contains a discussion of off-screen rape and torture.
author: A.J. Llewellyn
